title: An Idiot Abroad   (Sky Television - Complete Season 1)
description:
Ricky Gervais and Stephen Merchant are outraged that Karl has written off the Seven Wonders claiming they're all ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œa bit s**tÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ having never seen any of them with his own eyes. They've thrown down the gauntlet to send him around the globe to force him out of his comfort zone. Stephen wants the experience to broaden Karl's mind and change his outlook on the world. Ricky wants Karl to hate every minute of it for his own amusement.

Dispatched on what many would term a journey of a lifetime, the 'little Englander' will be putting his misgivings to one side as Karl finds out for himself what the fuss is about. He will travel to the Great Wall of China, Christ the Redeemer in Brazil, Petra in Jordan, Machu Picchu in Peru, Chichen Itza in Mexico, the Taj Mahal in India and the Great Pyramids of Egypt. Meanwhile Gervais and Merchant will be keeping a watchful eye from London, monitoring every step of PilkingtonÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s journey. The conclusion of the series will see the weary traveler returning home to report on his findings.

Karl commented: ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œI can't wait to get started. Not 'cos I'm excited but 'cos the sooner we start the sooner it will be over. The fact the nurse gave me an injection that protects me from dirty chimps put a dampener on the whole thing. I don't think Ross Kemp has to have that injection.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

This is the complete series from the preview show to the de-briefing show. hope you enjoy this series as much as i did.

ENjoy and Seed!!
